quote.author: Stefan Borggraefe (Software Engineer and local politican at the "Piratenpartei")
quote.text: Free Software is one of the defenders of our freedom in the information society. We have to use and support Free Software whenever possible in order to gain more power and control over the omnipresent information processing. If power shall remain to the people, public authorities in particular should not depend on software which source code is secret. Democracy needs Free Software!
